name: Beautiful Reflections
description:
Beautiful Reflections is a first-person, musical puzzle experience about following your senses. Players are guided by their ears through a sparse, uninhabited island, tasked with finding simple alignment of melody, harmony and rhythm and timbre through experimentation and exploration.

This is a game about listening and reflecting upon your surroundings - and, ultimately, taking your time. This is a short game that should take no more than 1-3 hours to fully experience, depending on the player’s ability to resolve musical/sonic puzzles. It is designed to be completable by players of all abilities. 

The game is not designed to be an intense experience, and while it may have a dynamic aesthetic at points, it does not contain any time-critical puzzles or action sequences.

This game is visually minimalist and should perform well on a wide range of systems without issue. Best played with a good pair of headphones and a comfortable controller.

Created by:

Sam Jones - Concept, Audio, Code, Puzzle Design

Jani-Petteri Sevon - Art, Level Design
